text: I played the game recently under a personal challenge: beat the game underleveled and ALL the bosses with a specific character(s) (Link Techs and F. ATK's excluded). I appreciate this year-old upload, but could you upload al the battle themes ("Battle Theme" (for random encounters and Anshar fight),"Boss Theme 1" (for the Opp. Senshi and Apsu bosses), "Boss Theme 2" (for all other bosses), and "Shaman Apsuu" (for the both "Deity of Destruction"/"Demon Apsu" fights)). I'd appreciate it if you can
author: mayborneflower

text:
the official name of the song is "Fantasy Attraction", and it really is from the Sailor Moon R game for the Snes.
Another Story had songs from every game, except the fighting and puzzle ones, but well, it's nice that you added at least one song of the SM games, since all the games have really awesome tracks, like "Queen Serenity" from Sailor Moon for the Snes, or Sailor Pluto's theme from the PSX fighting game :)

author: kefkaroth

text: this was a snes rpg that never made it to the states and was released only in japan.  from my exp this is a hell of a game to play. it has a nice soundtrack,u can play with all 10 sailor soldiers, and it has bosses from past like beryl,rubius and new future villians like sin and her girls  that resemble the scouts. the one downfall to this game is i wish i could fight beryl's generals instead they guide u in the game. and one important thing. this game is super TOUGH in difficulty
